headline: BMS to acquire longtime cell therapy partner 2seventy bio for $286m
summary: The deal comes after a challenging few years for 2seventy bio, which had divested research programmes in recent years.

headline: 2seventy bio, Bluebird’s cell therapy spinout, sells to Bristol Myers for less than $300M
summary: The deal ends 2Seventy’s short run as an independent company, during which it restructured, sold off research and lost nearly all of its market value.
